button.cpm.display.heldItem.head: Item on Head >
chat.cpm.serverRequiresCPM: The server requires CPM to be installed and communication enabled. Currently the 'Disable server communication' setting is set to 'true', and you will be kicked from the server. Open the Gestures menu [%s] to edit the settings.
chat.cpm.serverSafetySettings: The server has recommended safety settings. Open the Gestures menu [%s] to edit the safety settings.
chat.cpm.skinForced: Can't change skin. Your skin was force set by the operators of the server.
commands.cpm.usage: Usage: set: cpm setskin [-f|-t] <player> <base64_string> or reset: cpm setskin -r <player>
error.cpm.crash: A Customizable Player Models gui has crashed.\Please create a bug report on GitHub with your minecraft log attached.\Error: %s
error.cpm.custom_anims_not_supported: The current Skin Layer settings doesn't support\custom poses and gestures.\Please enable at least 2 layers for encoding\in Skin Layer settings under the 'Animation' tabs.
error.cpm.paste.unknownNetworkError: Unknown network error, while connecting to the paste site.\%s
error.cpm.projectNotTemplate: This project is not a template\Use Edit/Convert to Template
error.cpm.templateExportAsSkin: Template Project cannot be exported as a skin.
error.cpm.too_many_animations: Too many custom animations\for current Skin Layer settings.\Edit Skin layer settings under the 'Animation' tabs.
error.cpm.vanillaSkinSize: Invalid vanilla skin size, must be 64x64
error.paste.authFail: Failed to connect to paste site:\%s
error.paste.outOfSpace: Out of space on the paste site.\Try clearing unused pastes using 'Edit/Pastes' menu.
label.cpm.animSlot.head: Helmet:
label.cpm.arg_choose_part.desc: Select part to add to argument
label.cpm.config.titleScreenButton: Open Editor button on Title Screen
label.cpm.confirmSkinTypeEdit: Are you sure you want to change\the skin type from '%s' to '%s'?\Your model contains non converted vanilla parts,\which may look different on other skin types.
label.cpm.controls.text: Camera:\Hold the Middle mouse button to rotate the view.\Hold Shift+Middle mouse button to pan the view.\Can be changed to right click in Edit/Settings.\Number fields:\Shift to change by 0.1\Image Editor:\Ctrl+click to pick hovered color.
label.cpm.convertFail: Failed to convert model to skin
label.cpm.createGist: Please create a GitHub gist with the following text:
label.cpm.editor_not_supported: Some features of the editor\are not supported on the current minecraft version.\You may experience minor visual glitches with the editor.\Consider using a newer minecraft version for editing models.\Models are compatible across different minecraft versions.
label.cpm.elem.head: Head
label.cpm.elem.item.head: Head Item
label.cpm.error.blockedBySafety: Model loading stopped by safety settings for %s, Reason: %s
label.cpm.error.errorWhileLoading: Unexpected error occurred while loading model for %s. Error: %s
label.cpm.error.renderInitFail: Failed to render element for model %s render system isn't initialized correctly, please report this to the mod author
label.cpm.export.upload.desc: Exports then uploads the exported skin to minecraft.net.\!!! This will change your current minecraft skin !!!\If this doesn't work, export to an image and use your minecraft launcher to apply,\may need minecraft restart if you use your launcher.
label.cpm.feature_unavailable: Missing server-side mod/plugin, this feature is diabled!
label.cpm.filechooser.nativeError: Failed to open System File Chooser\Error: %s
label.cpm.filechooser.waitingForNative: Waiting for System File Chooser Popup.
label.cpm.gui_scale_too_large: Your Gui Scale is too big!\Some parts of the editor may not fit on screen.\Please change your gui scale in the options to something smaller.
label.cpm.modelNotSkinCompatible: Model file is not skin compatible
label.cpm.must_save: You have unsaved changes.\Save your project before converting to a template.
label.cpm.must_save.test: You have unsaved changes.\Save your project before testing.
label.cpm.name: Name
label.cpm.paste.connecting.title: Connecting...
label.cpm.paste.name: Paste Name:
label.cpm.recSettingsChange.title: Server recommended safety changes\Only accept it if you trust the server owner and all players.
label.cpm.result.base64_model.desc: Can be loaded with '/cpm setskin <player> <base64_string>' ingame.
label.cpm.result.skin_update.desc: Replace your skin model gist with this text:
label.cpm.result.template.desc: Template Link Text\Load it using Edit/Add Template
label.cpm.safetyBlocked: Model loading disabled by safety settings
label.cpm.skinForced: Your skin was force set by the server operators.
label.cpm.skinUpload.fail: Failed to upload skin to minecraft.net\Error: %s
label.cpm.skin_has_vanilla_parts: Model still has vanilla skin parts enabled.\Changing this setting won't have an affect on them.\Use Edit/Convert vanilla parts to convert them to custom parts.
label.cpm.skin_layers_to_use: Skin Layers to use for animations
label.cpm.template_place_tex.desc: Are you sure you want to place the template texture?\The underlying area will overwritten with the template texture.
label.cpm.template_place_tex.title: Place Template texture
label.cpm.test_model_exported: Test model exported, close the editor to test it.
label.cpm.test_unsupported: Test option is unsupported in this version
label.cpm.uploading.authFail: Failed to connect to minecraft.net\Please use your minecraft launcher, or minecraft.net\to upload the skin.
label.cpm.warnEditTransform: You have non hidden vanilla parts\Model transformations only work on custom parts.
label.cpm.warnMoveGenPart: You attempted to move a converted part!\You probably want to move the original part instead of the generated part.\This message won't appear again.
label.cpm.warn_c2t: Are you sure you want to convert your model to a template?\This operation cannot be undone.
tooltip.cpm.addAnimatedTex: Adds an animated texture region to the current texture.
tooltip.cpm.animType.group.hand: Held Item Animations\Animations for different type of held items\Only one animation type can play per hand.
tooltip.cpm.animType.group.layers: Layer Animations\The animation is played if the layer condition is met
tooltip.cpm.animType.group.pose: Pose Animations\Only one pose animation type can play
tooltip.cpm.animType.group.pose_server: Pose Animations\Only one pose animation type can play\Only works for other players\if the mod is installed on the server
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.bow_left: Bow changing in left hand\Animation speed is based on the charge time\The last frame repeats until release
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.bow_right: Bow charging in right hand\Animation speed is based on the charge time\The last frame repeats until release
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.crossbow_ch_le: Crossbow charging in left hand\Animation speed is based on the charge time
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.crossbow_ch_ri: Crossbow charging in right hand\Animation speed is based on the charge time
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.jumping: Plays for 500 ms when the player jumps
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.opt_gesture: Custom Gesture\Can be activated using the Gestures menu\Can loop or play once. Only one gesture can play
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.opt_pose: Custom Pose\Can be activated using the Gestures menu\Plays until deactivated.\Only one pose animation type can play
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.parrot_left: Parrot sitting on the left shoulder
tooltip.cpm.animType.pose.parrot_right: Parrot sitting on the right shoulder
tooltip.cpm.anim_priority: Animation apply priority\Animations are applied in order from lowest to highest.
tooltip.cpm.brushAlpha: Pixel transparency setting for the brush or fill tool.
tooltip.cpm.changeSkin: Uploads a skin to minecraft.net.\!!! This will change your current minecraft skin !!!
tooltip.cpm.clearAnimData: Remove the selected part from the current animation frame.
tooltip.cpm.cloneable: This model can be cloned and used by anyone.\Clone a model in the player settings menu.
tooltip.cpm.config.posMode.absolute: The parts origin is always at the center,\similar to Blockbench.
tooltip.cpm.config.posMode.relative: The child part's origin is at the parent's position. (Default)
tooltip.cpm.config.titleScreenButton: Show Open Editor button on the Title Screen\Open Editor button is also available in Options/Skin Customization gui.
tooltip.cpm.displServerInfo: Hold SHIFT and ALT to show server ip.
tooltip.cpm.display.onlyDrawOnSelected: Only allow drawing on selected parts.
tooltip.cpm.display.playAnimatedTex: Play the animated textures in the editor
tooltip.cpm.display.playVanillaAnims: Play vanilla animations while in the Animations/Setup tab.
tooltip.cpm.effect.hideHeadIfSkull: Hides the head model if wearing a skull\(On by default)
tooltip.cpm.effect.removeArmorOffset: Removes the offset from duplicated armor parts.\Makes animating duplicated armor parts easier.\(On by default, recommended)
tooltip.cpm.effect.scaling: Enable different model scaling options.\See the model tree for options.
tooltip.cpm.export.as_b64: Export Model as a Base64 String.\! This option is for map developers and server owners !\! You probably want to export as skin or model instead of Base64. !\Can be loaded with \'/cpm setskin [-f | -t] <player> <base64_string>'\ command ingame if server-side mod is loaded and you are an op.
tooltip.cpm.export.as_model: Export Model as a .cpmmodel file,\to be loaded in the Skin customization menu.\Can be changed while in-game.\! The mod is required on servers to load the model. !
tooltip.cpm.export.as_skin: Export Model as a skin file.\Works on vanilla servers
tooltip.cpm.export.as_template: Export Model as a template.\Templates can be imported into other projects.
tooltip.cpm.export.skin.cantUploadIngame: Can't upload skin while in-game.\Use 'Export: Model' on supported servers for in-game skin changing,\or Exit to the Title Screen and then try uploading.
tooltip.cpm.export.skin.exportApply: Exports then uploads the exported skin to minecraft.net.\!!! This will change your current minecraft skin !!!
tooltip.cpm.export.skin.vanillaSkinInfo: This is the skin that players without the mod will see\on multiplayer servers.
tooltip.cpm.export.skinCompat: Exports a skin type compatible model.\! The export size limit is much lower before needing a link file !\You can apply skin compatible models in-game without restarting the game,\with the built-in skin changer in the models menu,\accessible from the Editor under Edit/Models.\You must open the editor from the Title Screen for this to work.
tooltip.cpm.export_def: Create update for file linked to this skin.
tooltip.cpm.export_def.noLink: Vanilla skin doesn't have an encoded link file
tooltip.cpm.extrude_effect: Extrude a 2d texture into a 3d model, like held items.
tooltip.cpm.force_link_file: Force the exporter to use a link file.\Link files are usually stored on a paste site or as GitHub gists.
tooltip.cpm.glow: Previously Glowing.\Applies the vanilla glowing eyes effect, used by Enderman and Spider eyes,\to the selected part.
tooltip.cpm.hidden_effect: Hide the part by default, when rendering the model.\Visibility can be enabled by animations.\\This is not the same as using the hide part in the editor button,\under the model tree.
tooltip.cpm.new.template: Create a new Template project\Read the wiki on Using Templates
tooltip.cpm.notSupported: %s is not available on this version of Minecraft.
tooltip.cpm.recolor: Apply a color filter to the selected element.\Specify the color using the button below.\Animations can change the color of these elements.
tooltip.cpm.recolor.colorbtn: Select the color for the Color Filter.
tooltip.cpm.safety.blockNetwork: Disables loading custom models from the server.\Re-logging is required
tooltip.cpm.safetyProfile.high: Disables model loading for normal players.
tooltip.cpm.safetyProfile.low: Only load less resource intensive models.
tooltip.cpm.safetyProfile.medium: Only loads smaller models for normal players.\(Default setting)
tooltip.cpm.safetyProfile.off: Disables all of the safety settings.\!!! Warning models with large texture sheets !!!\!!! can use a lot of RAM and could crash your game. !!!\Only enable this on servers where you trust all of the players.
tooltip.cpm.singleTex: Use a single square texture on all sides of the cube.\The size of the square is determined by the largest size value of the element.\Applies to the selected element.
tooltip.cpm.texture_sheet: Skin texture resolution in pixels for Texture U/V.\Doesn't have to match actual image resolution.\Aspect ratio should match.
tooltip.cpm.tools.convert_model_custom: Converts Vanilla skin parts to custom\required if you want to have a bigger skin sheet.
tooltip.cpm.tree.at.anX: Toggle between vertical and horizontal\animation frame layout
tooltip.cpm.tree.at.from: Start of the animated texture frames
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.attack_dmg: Attack Damage Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.attack_knockbac: Attack Knockback Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.attack_speed: Attack speed scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.defense: Defense Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.entity: Global scaling with Pehkui.\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\Without these mods the model scale won't be affected.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.eye_height: Change eye height using Pehkui\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.fall_damage: Fall Damage Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.flight_speed: Creative Flight Speed Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.health: Health Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.hitbox_height: Change hitbox height using Pehkui\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.hitbox_width: Change hitbox width using Pehkui\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.mining_speed: Mining speed scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.mob_visibility: Mob Detection Distance Scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.model: Model Render Position, Rotation and Scale\Model transformations only work on custom parts.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.motion: All movement effect scale, like speed, jump height, step height\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.reach: Reach distance scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.step_height: Step height scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.\This setting is disabled by default.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.third_person: Third Person camera distance\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.
tooltip.cpm.tree.scaling.view_bobbing: View Bobbing speed scale\Customizable Player Models and Pehkui is required on both the client and server.
tooltip.cpm.uploadSkin: Converts and uploads the selected model to minecraft.net.\!!! This will change your current minecraft skin !!!
tooltip.cpm.uuidlock: Locks model definition to the current players UUID.\Current lock UUID: %s.\This can prevent model stealing with simple skin stealers.
tooltip.cpm.uuidlockOw: Locks model definition to the defined UUID.\Current lock UUID: %s.\This can prevent model stealing with simple skin stealers.
